org.jeo.vector

Interface Feature

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicFeature, DiffFeature, FeatureWrapper, GeometryTransformWrapper, MongoFeature, OGRFeature

    public interface Feature
    An object consisting of a set of named attributes, any of which may be a vector geometry.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo
    See Also:
    BasicFeature

    • Method Detail

      • id

        String id()
        Feature identifier.

      • crs

        org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs()
        The coordinate reference system for the feature.

        If necessary implementations should dervice from Schema.crs().

        Returns:
        The crs, or null if unknown.

      • has

        boolean has(String key)
        Check if a feature has an attribute. This should return true if the key exists even if the value is null.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute key is present, false otherwise.

      • get

        Object get(String key)
        Gets a named attribute of the feature.

        This method should return null if no such attribute named key exists.

        Parameters:
        key - The key or name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        The attribute value or null.

      • get

        Object get(int index)
        Gets an attribute of the feature by index.
        Parameters:
        index - The attribute index.
        Returns:
        The attribute value.

      • geometry

        com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry geometry()
        Geometry of the feature.
        Returns:
        a Geometry object, or null if the feature has no geometry.

      • put

        Feature put(String key,
          Object val)
        Sets a named attribute of the feature.
        Parameters:
        key - The key or name of the attribute.
        val - The new value of the attribute.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • set

        Feature set(int index,
          Object val)
        Sets a feature attribute by index.
        Parameters:
        index - The attribute index.
        val - The new value.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • put

        Feature put(com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.Geometry g)
        Sets the geometry of the feature.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • schema

        Schema schema()
        Get the schema of the feature, deriving it if necessary.

        Equivalent to schema(true)

      • schema

        Schema schema(boolean derive)
        Get a Schema for this Feature.

        The derive flag controls whether a schema for the feature should be derived if the feature does not have a native schema.

      • list

        List<Object> list()
        Returns an immutable list view of the feature

      • map

        Map<String,Object> map()
        Returns an immutable map view of the feature.
